description: 859 Other Business Services not Elsewhere Specified
extraDescription: Provision of staffing services to the Corporate Secretariat, Employment and Social Development Canada, relating to selection processes to staff 1 EC-02 position and up to 2 EC-04 positions for the Privacy Management Division
comments: This is a notice of the restatement of Contract 100003191 dated November 24, 2014. The contract was not captured by our financial system and the issue has been corrected since then. For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependent on the operational requirements of the department.
